subject: Mathematics
question_text: Two light beams fall on a transparent material block at point 1 and 2 with angle respectively, as shown in figure. After refraction, the beams intersect at point 3 which is exactly on the interface at other end of the block. Given : the distance between 1 and 2, , where refractive index of the block refractive index of the outside medium , then the thickness of the block is ________
